TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {221=The Delivery Man of the Year Award recognized the most outstanding relief pitcher of the season as voted on by the fans. The award was given out from 2005-2013 to one pitcher in each league.}
textBeforeTable: The Delivery Man of the Year Award recognized the most outstanding relief pitcher of the season as voted on by the fans. The award was given out from 2005-2013 to one pitcher in each league.
